title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for White Chicken Chili Imported Without the Benefit of Import Reinspection
summary: WASHINGTON, March 31, 2025 – The U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert for a ready-to-eat (RTE) white chicken chili imported from Canada that did not receive the benefit of import reinspection. A recall was not...
impacted_products: 7 lbs. 2 oz. cartons containing eight, 14.3-oz. plastic tubs of “Allen FAMILY FOODS WHITE CHICKEN CHILI with Bell Peppers, Corn & White Beans,” with lot codes E225077, E225079, E225080, E225081, E225083 and “best before by dates” of 03/18/2026, 03/20/20
